first_screen.title: Supply of components for construction projects
first_screen.second: We will ensure delivery of our goods as soon as possible from a warehouse in Moscow, or we will bring them from China
first_screen.block_first: More than 500 thousand units of goods in stock

second_screen.title: What benefits will you get by cooperating with the VYSOTA company?
second_screen.first_block_title: We have all the necessary licenses and approvals for products
second_screen.first_block_text: Our products have certificates and test reports, quality standard EN74-1/BS1139
second_screen.second_block_title: We work directly with trusted foreign manufacturers
second_screen.second_block_text: The Vysota company (Uralsnabresurs LLC) is a manufacturer of scaffolding in China at the TYT CO factories. LTD. A complete range of scaffolding, formwork and safety products for the construction and industrial sectors.
second_screen.third_block_title: Wide range of products and quality control system
second_screen.third_block_text: Thanks to close contacts with other equipment manufacturers in Russia, we offer clients the best solutions to their problems at minimal costs.
second_screen.forth_block_title: We guarantee the best price on the market
second_screen.forth_block_text: We ourselves produce clamps and components at factories in China and India, so we offer the most affordable prices.

forth_screen.project1_title: Construction of the Amur Gas Processing Plant

forth_screen.project6_text: Supply of Larsen sheet pile and timber 2020-2021
forth_screen.project8_title: Construction of a refinery in Nizhny Novgorod
forth_screen.project9_title: Construction of a booster compressor station on Sakhalin Island

delivery.title: Delivery to any point in Russia and CIS countries
delivery.text: We will ensure delivery of our goods as soon as possible from a warehouse in Moscow, or we will bring them from China.

reputation.title: Reliable reputation, time-tested
reputation.block1_title: Member of the register of bona fide suppliers since 2010.
reputation.block1_text: We have been included in the register of bona fide suppliers for more than 14 years
reputation.block2_title: We supplied components to the country's leading construction sites
reputation.block2_text: Such companies as Gazprom, Tekfen Construction, INTER RAO, Yamata, SIBUR, Renaissance construction, Velesstroy and many others trust us to complete their construction projects.
reputation.block3_title: Wide range of products and quality control system
reputation.block3_text: We supply clamps and components for scaffolding and formwork to the country's leading construction projects, including the Amur Gas Processing Plant, Yamal LNG, Tobolsk Polymer, Gas Pipeline in the Yamal Autonomous Okrug, Arctic LNG-2 Complex, Kharampurskoye Field.
reputation.block4_text: We have 3 warehouses in the Russian Federation, which helps us ensure delivery in the shortest possible time

gov_clients.title: We carry out complete sets of facilities of the largest state-owned companies

about.title: Company "Vysota" - leading supplier In the Russian Federation and the CIS construction scaffolding and formwork
about.text: We produce components at the largest factories in China, which allows us to offer the best prices on the market for our products. Components are produced on modern equipment.
about.block1_text: Clamps and components available in warehouses in Moscow
about.block3_text: We have partnerships with more than 150 enterprises in the Russian Federation and the CIS
about.block4_text: Our production has 14 production lines equipped with advanced equipment
